metadata.title: Health effects of water consumption and water quality

abstract.original_text: The subject of microbiological safety of water will very soon become an international priority as travel across national boundaries and the sheer numbers of human citizens increase in the decade ahead, placing Promethean demands on water resources. (Ford and Colwell, 1996) The Handbook of Water and Wastewater Microbiology

sentences.segment_text: The subject of microbiological safety of water will very soon become an international priority as travel across national boundaries and the sheer numbers of human citizens increase in the decade ahead ,
placing Promethean demands on water resources .
